name: Tunnel RPS
description:
A simplistic twist of the Rock, Paper, Scissors concept. This game was created for three Game Jams that happened at the same time:

- Weekly Game Jam (Week 154)

- 1-bit Weekend

- ScoreSpace x Alakajam

It also served as an experiment of using the Godot Engine for creating a game (source is available if you want to play around with it, but be warned that the implementation is far from ideal).

You can download an executable for your platform of choice or play it directly in the browser (both keyboard and gamepads are supported).

Font provided by Damien Gosset at dafont.com
